div.bibl: Krasnow Scrapbooks, Vol. I, owned by Dr. H. R. Krasnow, 4601 N. Broadway, Chicago, Ill.

body.p: Sunday, March 2, in Bowen Hall, Hull House, corner Polk and Halsted streets, Professor Lomonosov will lecture on the subject "Dark Times (1606-1612) and the Present Moment."
(b) The crumbling of the old government system
The lecture begins at 2:30 P. M. Come to the song and music evening and ball arranged by the society "Enlightenment" Saturday, March 1, in its quarters at 1115 N. Robey Street.
